entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:05 AM MDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
